      • getCompanyById

        public Companies getCompanyById(int companyId)
        Get a company from the private database from their company Id.
        Parameters:
        companyId - company Id that wants to be found.
        Returns:
        company if found, null if not found.

      • getCompanyByName

        public Companies getCompanyByName(String companyName)
        Get a company from the private database from their name.
        Parameters:
        companyName - company Name that wants to be found.
        Returns:
        company if found, null if not found.

      • createCompany

        public void createCompany(Companies company)
        Create a new company in the private database.
        Parameters:
        company - the company (model) that wants to be inserted into the private database.

      • deleteCompanyById

        public boolean deleteCompanyById(int companyId)
        Delete a company from the private database based on the company Id.
        Parameters:
        companyId - company Id that wants to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if company is deleted, false if company is not found

      • updateCompany

        public boolean updateCompany(Companies company)
        Update a company based on the provided company model.
        Parameters:
        company - full company model (including the companyId).
        Returns:
        true if company is successfully updated, false if the specific company is not found.
